text: Pa tsiku limene mzimu uliwonse udzaona zabwino zonse zimene udachita zitabweretsedwa ndiponso zoipa zonse zimene udachita, iwo udzafunitsitsa kuti pakadakhala mtunda wautali pakati pa iwo ndi zoipazo. Ndipo Mulungu ali kukuchenjezani inu zachilango chake ndipo Mulungu ali ndi chisoni chambiri kwa akapolo ake
